about_the_game:
Celestian Tales: Old North Original Soundtrack by Agate Simfonia with vocals by Puspallia Panggabean and Shiellia Permatasari features 17 music tracks created exclusively for the game, fully remastered for this release and includes an all-new bonus material.

Files are in FLAC format for enhanced hearing pleasure and will be placed in your Celestian Tales: Old North folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Celestian Tales Old North\Original Soundtrack
